org.gvsig.raster.impl.grid.filter.histogramMatching

Class HistogramMatchingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.fmap.dal.coverage.grid.filter.BaseRasterFilter
      • org.gvsig.raster.impl.grid.filter.histogramMatching.HistogramMatchingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, RasterFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HistogramMatchingByteFilter

    public class HistogramMatchingFilter
extends BaseRasterFilter
    Filtro para la aplicación de HistogramMatching a un raster.
